content.text: 1 (2 to 3 pound) whole chicken, cut into pieces
content.eamr: ( ing-4 "1 (2 to 3 pound) whole chicken, cut into pieces" )

content.text: 0) Heat the shortening in a large, cast iron skillet over medium-high heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Heat"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the shortening"@8:22 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large, cast iron skillet"@26:52 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "medium-high heat"@58:74 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) In a brown paper lunch bag, combine the flour, salt, and pepper.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "combine"@31:38 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "the flour"@39:48 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "salt"@50:54 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "pepper"@60:66 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "a brown paper lunch bag"@6:29 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Shake two chicken pieces in the bag to coat, and place them in the skillet.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Shake"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "two chicken pieces"@9:27 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-2-0 "the bag"@31:38 / TOOL )
		:prp ( purp-2-0 "to coat"@39:46 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-1 "place"@52:57 / AC
		:ppt ( "them"@58:62 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-2-1 "the skillet"@66:77 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Repeat until all of the chicken is coated and in the skillet.
4) Fry the chicken over medium-high heat until all of the pieces have been browned on both sides.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Fry"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( "the chicken"@7:18 / FOOD )
		:heat ( temp-4-0 "medium-high heat"@24:40 / TEMPERATURE )
		:until ( cond-4-0 "until all of the pieces have been browned on both sides"@41:96 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Turn the heat to medium-low, cover, and cook for 25 minutes.
6) Remove the lid, and increase heat to medium-high.
7) Continue frying until chicken pieces are a deep golden brown, and the juices run clear.
